sentences.sContent: ...a small, quaint town with narrow streets and traditional half-timbered houses.
sentences.sCn: …一座古朴的小镇，有着狭窄的街道和传统的半木制房屋。

synos.tran: 古雅的；奇怪的；离奇有趣的；做得很精巧的

words.tran: 离奇有趣地；古雅地；优雅地

trans.tranCn: 古雅的；奇怪的；离奇有趣的；做得很精巧的
trans.tranOther: Something that is quaint is attractive because it is old-fashioned
